subtitles.original: Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang-Born
subtitles.english: Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang-Born

subtitles.original: 絶え間ない火光 もいらな もはやICUよりICY (Icy, icy)
subtitles.english: Unending flashing lights, no longer needed, cooler than the ICU (Icy, icy)

subtitles.original: 俺 パッと見できない事ばかりだけど very happy
subtitles.english: At a glance, there are many things I can't do, but I'm very happy

subtitles.original: あきれてる あきれてる 周り 恵まれてる家族とダチ
subtitles.english: Those around me are fed up, but I'm blessed with family and friends

subtitles.original: 反射的タッチ みんな俺に任せとけばいい
subtitles.english: Reflexive touch, everyone can just leave it to me

subtitles.original: 一生ない紋章 一緒にない重宝 パッとのまじない
subtitles.english: A crest that'll never exist, a treasure that's never together, a sudden spell

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡 答えちゃって Who's the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, answer me, who's the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah

subtitles.original: 生身のまま行けるトコまで To the next, to the 1番上
subtitles.english: Going as far as I can in this flesh, to the next, to the very top

subtitles.original: Now singin'
subtitles.english: Now singin'

subtitles.original: Eyday 俺のままで居るだけで超flex
subtitles.english: Eyday, just being myself is a huge flex

subtitles.original: Eyday 誰も口を挟ませない (Don't test)
subtitles.english: Eyday, I won't let anyone interfere (Don't test)

subtitles.original: Eyday 俺のままで居るだけで超flex
subtitles.english: Eyday, just being myself is a huge flex

subtitles.original: Eyday 誰も口を挟ませない (Don't test)
subtitles.english: Eyday, I won't let anyone interfere (Don't test)

subtitles.original: 覚悟決める前科もねえ 余裕でBling-Bang-Bang
subtitles.english: No criminal record before making a decision, effortlessly Bling-Bang-Bang

subtitles.original: この存在自体が文化財なの最高位Bling-Bang-Bang
subtitles.english: This existence itself is a cultural asset, the highest rank Bling-Bang-Bang

subtitles.original: 国境を超える目深ないアジアにBling-Bang-Bang
subtitles.english: Crossing borders into the hidden Asia, Bling-Bang-Bang

subtitles.original: 動く各地揺らすEPこのレベルBling-Bang-Bang
subtitles.english: Moving regions, shaking the EP, at this level Bling-Bang-Bang

subtitles.original: パレットなら満杯完成のまわり 生身のことだんま
subtitles.english: The palette is full, surrounding completion, keeping quiet about the raw truth

subtitles.original: 音楽幸 勝利の女神 今夜も散々ババンバ
subtitles.english: Music luck, the goddess of victory, tonight as well, it's a wild party

subtitles.original: 漫画みたいな絵柄のままで 張り合いてしまってるワンガ
subtitles.english: Staying in a manga-like style, competing with the wanderers

subtitles.original: 圧倒的力 この頭と口から
subtitles.english: Overwhelming power, from this head and mouth

subtitles.original: この体は吐いてない この空に刻みついてない
subtitles.english: This body hasn't spat it out, it's not etched into this sky

subtitles.original: 繰り返しやらかすくたべちか いかつい年を刻みししわ
subtitles.english: Repeating mistakes, a tough year etched in wrinkles

subtitles.original: Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang-Born
subtitles.english: Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang, Bling-Bang-Bang-Born

subtitles.original: 俺のままでBlingしてBangしてBornする為にBornして生きていこう
subtitles.english: Born to Bling, Bang, and Born as myself, let's live on

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡 答えちゃって Who's the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, answer me, who's the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah

subtitles.original: 生身のまま行けるトコまで To the next, to the 1番上
subtitles.english: Going as far as I can in this flesh, to the next, to the very top

subtitles.original: Now singin'
subtitles.english: Now singin'

subtitles.english: Eyday, just being myself is a huge flex

subtitles.original: Eyday 誰も口を挟ませない (Don't test)
subtitles.english: Eyday, I won't let anyone interfere (Don't test)

subtitles.original: 実際に感情はのせん 気づかないふり 絶対的な虚実と心中
subtitles.english: In reality, I don't invest emotions, pretending not to notice, committing suicide with absolute falsehood

subtitles.original: そうやって煽るアンチ 傷の切り売り 脆く叫ぶ醜態
subtitles.english: Inciting antis like that, selling off my wounds, a fragile, screaming disgrace

subtitles.original: そんなあなたにはお勧め 最高級の逃避行 やがて甘美な罠に嵌れば救われる
subtitles.english: For someone like you, I recommend the finest escapism, if you eventually fall into the sweet trap, you'll be saved

subtitles.original: もはや正気の沙汰ではやっていけないこの娑婆じゃ 敢えて差し出すその手に身を任せるのが最適解
subtitles.english: You can no longer manage with sanity in this world, the best solution is to entrust yourself to that hand proactively offered

subtitles.original: お言葉で飾った 寒空を 心を奪う甘い物だ
subtitles.english: Decorated with words, the wintry sky is a sweet thing that steals your heart

subtitles.original: 全てが染まっていくような 辞書に交渉中
subtitles.english: Negotiating with the dictionary as if everything is being dyed

subtitles.original: さらば！ こんな事態にあつらえ 騙し騙されのギジャエエ 本能芝居で騙される
subtitles.english: Farewell! Tailored for such a situation, a gigue of deceiving and being deceived, fooled by instinctive acting

subtitles.original: やたらとうるさい心臓の音 正気はもう意味ないなんて 磨り減る耐久性
subtitles.english: The heartbeats are incredibly noisy, sanity is no longer here, durability wearing thin

subtitles.original: 目の前の事象を傍受 現実に生きるの限界 お願い助けてね
subtitles.english: Intercepting the phenomena before me, at the limit of living in reality, please help me

subtitles.original: あなただんだん眠くなる 浅浅なメズマライズ 頭空っぽ無になれば もさかまた騙らか
subtitles.english: You are getting sleepier and sleepier, a shallow mesmerization, if your head becomes empty and void, perhaps you'll be deceived again

subtitles.original: 目の前で揺らめく効果 動かなくなる体 これでいいんだ自分さえも 騙し騙しちゃった
subtitles.english: The flickering effect before your eyes, a body that won't move, this is fine, I've even fooled myself

subtitles.original: あなただんだん眠くなる 浅浅なメズマライズ...
subtitles.english: You are getting sleepier and sleepier, a shallow mesmerization...

subtitles.original: そんなに今日も意気抜いても 報われぬエブリデイ もうバカみたいなサイクルで だっさい瞬間を続けているの
subtitles.english: Even if you exert yourself so much today, an unrewarding everyday, repeating useless moments in a foolish cycle

subtitles.original: うまくいかないのはっぱ 恐ろしい情景 ないものねだり諦めて 余り物で勝負するのか
subtitles.english: Things not going well is a terrible sight, give up on asking for the impossible, will you compete with leftovers?

subtitles.original: さらば！ こんな事態にあつらえ 騙し騙されのギジャエエ 本能芝居で騙される
subtitles.english: Farewell! Tailored for such a situation, a gigue of deceiving and being deceived, fooled by instinctive acting

subtitles.original: やたらとうるさい心臓の音 正気はもう意味ないなんて 見せかけのカリスマ
subtitles.english: The heartbeats are incredibly noisy, sanity is no longer here, a superficial charisma

subtitles.original: 現実を直視しすぎると 失明しちゃうんだ だから適当にね
subtitles.english: If you look too closely at reality, you'll go blind, so just take it easy
